title: im in low-priority que beacuse my game crashed and i coudnt reconnect but eventually i did
body: my game crashed on the macbook and i encountered an unspecified error for 20 i couldn't reconnect. eventually i did i finished the match and now ive been put in a low priority que thanks to your patch crashing my game. Summoner name: CosmicYoshi. please undo this

replies.body: Unfortunately it can't be undone. The game has no way of telling that you left because it crashed, and there's no way to prove you were there till the end of the game, actively doing stuff.
